wikimania: Used as image alt text and in the branding banner
nav-apply: Navigation menu label, links to scholarship request submission form
nav-faq: Navigation menu label, links to Scholarships/FAQ wiki page
nav-credits: Navigation menu label, links to software credits page
nav-privacy: Navigation menu label, links to privacy policy page
nav-contact: Navigation menu label, links to contact information page
nav-language: Navigation menu label, followed by a select list of language codes
nav-review: Navigation menu label for list of review pages
nav-reports: Navigation menu label for list of report pages
nav-admin: Navigation menu label for list of administrative pages
nav-users: Navigation menu label, links to user list page
nav-account: Navigation menu label for list of pages specific to the authenticated user's account
mock: Disclaimer shown on scholarship request form when application is being used for testing and development
not-open: Content for site landing page before date that scholarship request will be accepted
deadline-passed: Content for site landing page after scholarship request period has closed
form-intro: Static content to be shown at the top of the scholarship request form in a callout box
form-error: Error message shown to user when scholarship request form submission is incomplete
form-save-error: Error message shown to user when a system error occurred saving the application data
required-field: Shown at the top of the data input form to explain the styling of required form fields to the user
form-fname: Input label, followed by text box
form-lname: Input label, followed by text box
form-email: Input label, followed by text box
form-residence: Input label, followed by select list of country names
form-haspassport: Input label, followed by yes and no radio buttons
form-nationality: Input label, followed by select list of country names
form-airport: Input label, followed by text box
form-language: Input label, followed by text box
form-dateofbirth: Input label, followed by 3 select lists for day, month and year
form-select: Used as default value in most select lists
form-select-day: Default value for date of birth day of month select
form-select-month: Default value for date of birth month of year select
form-select-year: Default value for date of birth year select
form-gender: Input label, followed by select list of gender options
form-gender-other: Gender option, makes form-gender-specify a required field
form-gender-specify: Input label, followed by text box
form-occupation: Input label, followed by text box
form-study: Input label, followed by text box
form-username: Input label, followed by text box
form-other-usernames: Input label, followed by text box
form-active-projects: Input label, followed by 3 select lists of Wikimedia projects as domain names (eg en.wikipedia.org, www.mediawiki.org)
form-extent-explain: Input label, followed by multi-line text box
form-contrib-explain: Input label, followed by multi-line text box
form-attended: Input label, followed by multiple checkboxes labeled with years (eg 2013, 2012)
form-presenter: Input label, followed by yes and no radio buttons
form-presentation-topic: Input label, followed by text box
form-howheard: Input label, followed by select list of options
form-enrichment: Input label, followed by multi-line text box
form-review: Static content in the application form
form-chapteragree: Input label, followed by yes and no radio buttons
form-rights-heading: Static content in the application form
form-rights: Static content in the application form, contains legal wording
form-wmfagree: Input label, preceeded by checkbox, refers to form-rights-heading and content
form-wmfAgreeName: Input label, followed by text box
form-wmfAgreeGuardian: Input label, followed by text box
form-email-response:
Email body. Parameters:
* $1 - Applicant given name
* $2 - Applicant surname
new-account-email:
Email body. Parameters:
* $1 - Account username
* $2 - Acocunt password
* $3 - URL to login page of application
* $4 - URL to password change page of application
help-translate: Translation page title and navigation toolbar item
footer-faq: Page footer navigation label, links to Scholarships/FAQ wiki page
footer-credits: Page footer navigation label, links to credits page
footer-privacy: Page footer navigation label, links to privacy page
footer-contact: Page footer navigation label, links to contact page
month-jan: Date of birth month of year select option, January
month-feb: Date of birth month of year select option, February
month-mar: Date of birth month of year select option, March
month-apr: Date of birth month of year select option, April
month-may: Date of birth month of year select option, May
month-jun: Date of birth month of year select option, June
month-jul: Date of birth month of year select option, July
month-aug: Date of birth month of year select option, August
month-sep: Date of birth month of year select option, September
month-oct: Date of birth month of year select option, October
month-nov: Date of birth month of year select option, November
month-dec: Date of birth month of year select option, December
login: Login page heading and label for form submit button
username: Input label, followed by text box
password: Input label, followed by text box
login-success: Message shown to user when authentication succeeds
login-failed: Message shown to user when authentication fails
login-error: Message shown to user when authentication form is submitted with incomplete data
error-id:
Fatal error identifier. Parameters:
* $1 - short alpha numeric string unique to this error occurrence
404-header: Page not found (HTTP 404 error) page heading
404-message: Page not found (HTTP 404 error) page content
phase-1: Navigation menu label, links to list of scholarship requests needing phase 1 (complete, invalid) review or the phase 1 input form for a particular scholarship request
phase-2: Navigation menu label, links to list of scholarship requests needing phase 2 (ranking) review or the phase 2 input form for a particular scholarship request
phase-1-success: Navigation menu label, links to report of scholarship requests passing phase 1 review
phase-1-fail: Navigation menu label, links to report of scholarship requests denied by phase 1 review
phase-2-list: Navigation menu label, links to report of scholarship requests under phase 2 review
final-full: Navigation menu label, links to report of scholarship request review results
review: Navigation menu label, links to review page for a particular scholarship request
search: Navigation menu item, links to scholarship request search page
by-country: Navigation menu item, links to report of scholarship request counts by country
by-region: Navigation menu item, links to report of scholarship request counts by geographic region
change-password: Navigation menu item, links to password change page
logout: Navigation menu item, links to logout page
password-username: Input label, followed by authenticated user's username
old-password: Input label, followed by text box
new-password: Input label, followed by text box
new-password-again: Input label, followed by text box
save-password: Password change form submit button label
admin-user-id: Input label, followed by numeric user id
admin-user-email: Input label, followed by text box
admin-users-id: Table column header, user id number
admin-users-reviewer: Table column header, is user a reviewer
admin-users-admin: Table column header, is user an administrator
admin-users-blocked: Table column header, is user blocked from authenticating
admin-users-yes: Table cell value indicating that true/false value is true
admin-users-no: Table cell value indicating that true/false value is false
admin-users-add: Navigation menu item, links to user account creation page
review-list-export: Button label, triggers csv report download
review-list-export-csv: Input label, preceded by checkbox, changes form sumbission response to csv report download
review-list-id: Table column header, scholarship submission identity
review-list-name: Table column header, applicant full name
review-list-email: Table column header, applicant email address
review-list-p1-score: Table column header, submission phase 1 score
review-list-p2-score: Table column header, submission phase 2 score
review-list-residence: Table column header, applicant country of residence
review-list-num-p2: Table column header, number of phase 2 reviewers of submission
review-list-onwiki: Table column header, average onwiki review score of submission
review-list-offwiki: Table column header, average offwiki review score of submission
review-list-interest: Table column header, average interest review score of submission
review-countries-count: Table column header, number of scholarship applications received
review-view-not-specified: Report content indicating that an answer was not provided for an optional question
review-view-full-dump: Report section label, section contains list of database column names and values associated with scholarship application submission
review-view-scorings: Report section label, section contains scores given to specific scholarship application submission
review-view-criteria: Table column header, scholarship application attribute rated by reviewer
review-view-rank: Table column header, rating given to scholarship application submission for a specific attribute
review-view-reviewers: List header, list contains usernames of reviewers
review-view-rankings: Header for scholarship application evaluation form
review-view-valid: Input label, followed by select list
review-view-onwiki: Input label, followed by select list
review-view-offwiki: Input label, followed by select list
review-view-interest: Input label, followed by select list
review-view-notes: Input label, followed by multi-line text box
page-of-pages:
Paginated report page indicator. Parameters:
* $1 - current page number
* $2 - total page count
no-results: Content for report with no results
